title: KT App
description: The KT App, by BiKay and Melon Rouge for East-West Seed Knowledge Transfer Foundation, improves agricultural training with essential features for over 716,000 farmers facilitating access to knowledge and supporting safe vegetable cultivation.

title: Shuttle Bus Booking System
description: With more than 200 active users, Shuttle bus Booking system enhances transportation for students, lecturers and guest supporting seamless travel from Phnom Penh Kirirom
longDescription: Participated in an internal internship project in building booking system that is being used by more than 200 users. This system is build to replace google sheet that have been used before in order for students, staff, guest know what exact date that have a bus to travel from Phnom Penh to Kirirom

title: Shuttle Bus Admin System
description: allowing for the meticulous management of schedules, buses, destinations, and comprehensive user profiles within the application

title: vKClub
description: With over 70 active users, the VKClub App enhances the vKirirom Pine Resort experience by offering connectivity, safety features, payment, and updates in one convenient platform.
